oai_dc:dc.dc:title: National Cemetery in Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “National Cemetery, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image of pathway in cemetery, with graves to the side.
“Miss Carry Lillard -- Decatur, -- Tenn. -- Coleman -- I have found -- two fellow in -- town with a wagon -- from Camp. So -- I will go out -- with them -- Stewart”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National Cemetery; cemeteries; monuments;
